title: feature request: drop-off file sharing solution for non-registered users
body:
greetings,

i wish for a feature where an one-time token could be generated from non-registered to upload & share files with registered users.

with the latest owncloud solution i can share files from the inside-to-inside and inside-to-outside flawlessly, thanks owncloud team!... but... i hope there is a room for a bit more...

i suggest and improvement of the outside-to-inside file sharing. for example, if i need someone to "drop-off" a file for me (to my owncloud account), either i create an account for them, or i share a folder (from my account) so the external user can upload the file in my folder. 

with the available features in owncloud i always need to  take action first, if i'm not available, the user may choose another file sharing services, but this not what i want, if they have to share something with me, i want them to use something that i can control, owncloud. 

it would be awesome to have a drop-off file sharing feature in the log-in page for non-registered users, it should not be enabled by default and of course have the ability to enable or disable such feature.

thanks for reading.
